description: Single storey rear conservatory extension; and re-roofing works to the property
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 001 (Location and block plans); 001 (Existing site photos); 001 002 (Proposed site plan); 110 001 Rev. A (Existing and proposed ground floor plan); 110 002 (Existing and proposed rear elevation and section); 110 003 (Existing east and north elevations); 110 004 (Proposed roof plan and details); 111 001 (Roof repairs); 220 001 (Proposed plans and elevations); Heritage Appraisal (dated May 2022); Design and Access Statement (dated 01.06.22); Roof condition report (dated 01.06.22); Fire strategy (dated 30.05.22); Flood risk assessment (dated 20.05.22) (revision received 23.09.2022)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site. The roof must be replaced with an exact like-for-like equivalent, in terms of design, colour, detail and proportion. The proposed conservatory must be constructed with the materials as specified in the documentation provided.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan (2007), the Bedford Park Conservation Area Appraisal (2007), policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the roof of the building.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
